7 Known issues

Here are documented all the issues known by the team and the solutions provided if exists.

7.1 Failed to decode downloaded font

Symptom

When try to compile the project, your receive the next error by the Grunt console:

Failed to decode downloaded font: https://my-own-url/vendors/assets/fonts/stratio-fonticon/ico_stratio.ttf?-5duxr7
login:1 OTS parsing error: invalid version tag

How to fix

This is a problem of the Icomoon generated font ico_stratio. Try to update the version of the font (contact the Stratio design team) or contact the Egeo dev team using the Egeo G+ community, github issues or email.

7.2 The map of color isn't a valid CSS value

Symptom

When try to compile the project, your receive the next error by the Sass console:

>> File "front-source/styles/main.scss" changed.
Running "sass:dist" (sass) task
>> (a1: #37b5e4, a1_dark: #2d96bd, a1_light: #3dc9fc, a2: #b5c1c5, a2_dark: #919b9e, a2_light: #ccd9de, a3: #405467, a3_dark: #283440, a3_light: #4f6880, n0: #fff, n1: #fbfbfb, n2: #f3f3f3, n3: #e4e4e4, n4: #cbcbcb, n5: #b5b5b5, n6: #999, n7: #777, n8: #555, n9: #242424, n10: #000, b1: #172734, b2: #0f1b27, b3: #eff2f3, b3_dark: #e1e4e5, b4: #fff, s1: #88b060, s1_dark: #759653, s1_light: #9ab084, s2: #ff8900, s2_dark: #e57a00, s2_light: #ffa033, s3: #e23b2b, s3_dark: #c93426, s3_light: #e36459, t1: #d0c120, t2: #21d8de, t3: #bcea3f) isn't a valid CSS value.
>>   Line XX  Column X  node_modules/egeo.ui.base/src/settings/_settings.colors.scss
Warning:  Use --force to continue.

How to fix

This is a problem of Sass versions normally occur when you have different versions of Sass running locally and globally in your machine. Check that you are using only one version (preferably the local one) and ensure that your Sass version is, at least, the v3.3.

Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
